GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1913 as Northwestern Normal School, acquired present title 1987.
GeneralInformation.AcademicYear: August to May. Also Summer Session
AdmissionRequirements: Graduation from high school or equivalent, and College Board SAT or ACT examination

GeneralInformation.AcademicYear: August to May (August-December; January-May). Also Summer sessions (May to June; June to August)
AdmissionRequirements: TOEFL score of 525 (470 for conditional admission and English study)

Divisions.College: Agriculture, Food Systems and Natural Resources

GeneralInformation.History: Created 1973 and received first accreditation in 1988. Was previously known as Fort Berthold Community College.
Founded as Standing Rock Community College (SRCC) 1973. Acquired present title and status 1996.

Address.college_name: Trinity Bible College and Graduate School

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1948 as Lakewood Park Bible School. Became Trinity Bible College, 1964. Acquired present title

Divisions.Details: *Education Degrees are completed through an articulation agreement with Valley City State University. Education majors will receive their degree through Valley City State University.

GeneralInformation.History: Created 1972 by the Turtle Mountain Chippewa Tribe. First accredited 1984.
Founded 1883 as Jamestown College. Acquired present title and status 2013.
Founded 1959 by the Benedictine Sisters of Annunciation Priory (Roman Catholic Church).
GeneralInformation.AcademicYear: August to April. Also Summer Session (June-July); and May Term
AdmissionRequirements: Graduation from high school or equivalent, and College Board SAT or ACT examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1883, the largest institution of higher education in the region of North Dakota, South Dakota and Montana. A centre for innovation and academic excellence in the upper Midwest.
AdmissionRequirements: Graduation from high school or equivalent, and College Board SAT or ACT examination
TOEFL or IELTS test for international students

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1890 as State Normal School. Acquired present title and status 1987.
